title: Unit​
content: </> type Unit = UnitMillisecond | UnitSecond | UnitMinute | UnitHour | UnitDay | UnitWeek | UnitMonth | UnitYear

title: toNumber​
content: </> ms.toNumber( value: string, unit: Unit? ) → number Converts a string to a number. The output number is in milliseconds unless a unit is specified. ms.toNumber("1m 30s") -- 90000 ms.toNumber("1m 30s", "s") -- 90

title: toString​
content: </> ms.toString( value: number, format: "long" | "short"?, inputUnit: Unit? ) → string Converts a number to a string. The number is assumed to be in milliseconds. unless an inputUnit is specified. Values are rounded to the nearest whole number. Weeks are not displayed. Milliseconds are not displayed unless the input value is less than 1 second. ms.toString(9000) -- "9s" ms.toString(9001) -- "9s" ms.toString(90, "long") -- "90 milliseconds" ms.toString(9, nil, "s") -- "9s" ms.toString(9, "long", "s") -- "9 seconds"
